msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: This light-brown papyrus is regularly cut at all sides. The sheet is well preserved apart from a vertical tear. 3 kolleseis. (TC)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of each tax payer. (TC)

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

keywords.term: see electronic version of P.Mich. IV, 224

div.ab: "Hadrianius 11, (Column) 1;Horos, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Ptolemas, 16 drachmas;;Ptolemaios, son of Sambas, grandson of Sabeinos, mother Aphrodous 4 drachmas;;the same12th year, the remainder is the administrator fee;;Horos, son of Angkhoryphis, grandson of Horos, mother Acheillides, 4 bronze drachmas;;Ptolemaios, son of Orsenouphis, grandson of Erieus, mother Antheia 8 drachmas;;Sisois, son of Onnophris, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Tapetheus, 16 drachmas;;12th year: Maron, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Sampathion, mother Taseus, 4 bronze drachmas, the remainder is the administrator fee;;Sisois, son of Naaraus the second, grandson of Theabeneus, mother Thaisas, 4 drachmas;;Mysthes, son of Naraaus, grandson of Petheus, mother Taorsenouphis, 12 drachmas;;Zenas, son of Phaesis, grandson of Zenas, mother Tapasion, 8 drachmas;;Horos, son of Petheus, grandson of Auneios, mother Eseremphis, 8 drachmas;;12th year Maron, son of Limnaios, grandson of Maron, mother Thasias 16 drachmas, 4 bronze drachmas;;Artemas, son of Heron, grandson of Petheus, mother Thaesis, 8 drachmas;;Ptolemaios, son of Petermouthis, grandson of Apyngchis, mother Thermouthis, 4 drachmas, 28 obols;;Horos the younger, son of Atreios, grandson of Horos, mother Teraus, 4 drachmas;;Phanomgeus, son of Tesenouphis, grandson of Harpaesis, mother Thaesis, 8 drachmas;;Ptolemaios, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Tapsais, 8 drachmas;;Satabous, son of Dioskoros, grandson of Satabous, mother Taorion, 4 drachmas;;Petaus, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Thaesis, 12 drachmas;;Ptolemaios, son of Naaraus, grandson of Horion, mother Taorsenouphis, 8 drachmas;;Harsiesis, son of Petheus, grandson of Harsiesis, mother Thatrious, 4 drachmas;;Heron, son of Onnophris, grandson of Theabeneus, mother Tapetheus, 28 obols;;Pakysis, son of Panesneus, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tapetheus, 4 drachmas;;12th year: Petheus, son of Pasoknopaios, grandson of Petheus, mother Tapetheus, 4 bronze drachmas, 28 obols;;12th year: Pnepheros, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thaesis, 4 bronze drachmas;;Orsenouphis, son of Petheus, grandson of Horion, mother Tapetheus, 8 drachmas;;Petesouchos, son of Petesouchos, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Tasoucharion, 8 drachmas;;Didymion, son of Petheus the elder, grandson of Didymion, mother Tasoucharion, 4 drachmas;;Ammonis, son of Ammonios, grandson of Ammonios, mother Tninis, 4 drachmas;;Valeris, fatherless, mother Valerias, 8 drachmas;;the total for the day 224 drachmas, 8 obols, of which in the12th year 40drachmas, 10 obols;;The 12 of the same (month);;Sambas, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Sambas, mother Taeuemeros, 16 drachmas;;the 12th year, Horos, son of Harpagathes, grandson of Horos, mother Thaesis ; 8 bronze drachmas, the remainder is the administartor fee of the priests;;The same 13th year,;the same 12th year, priest Isis, daughter of Phramareios, the old;drachmas 1, 2 obols, 2 chalkoi; additional taxes - kollyboi 2 chalkoi, the total 1 drachma, 3.5 obols."
